sentences.sContent: It was their serenity which galled her most.
sentences.sContent_eng: It was their serenity which galled her most.
sentences.sCn: 最让她恼怒的是他们的平静。

sentences.sContent: He thought of her serenity as a foil for his intemperance.
sentences.sContent_eng: He thought of her serenity as a foil for his intemperance.
sentences.sCn: 在他看来，她的平静反衬出了他的放纵。

sentences.sContent: He attacks your purity with lust, and he attacks your serenity with worry.
sentences.sContent_eng: He attacks your purity with lust, and he attacks your serenity with worry.
sentences.sCn: 他攻击欲望你的纯度，他用焦虑攻击你的宁平静。

synos.tran: 平静，宁静；晴朗，风和日丽

remMethod.val: seren (看作serene， 平静的) + ity (表示名词) → 平静

words.tran: 平静的；安详的；清澈的；晴朗的
